title: ↪ 🔥 SUNNY ISLES: Easy To Show   Direct Ocean View, Large 2 2/2.5 Furnished
posting_body: ['REF# 11R114', '$6800 · Furnished · 2/2.5 · La Perla Condo · 1602 Sqft · Sunny Isles', 'Call ➟ Text ➟ WhatsApp', "📲 786'*'5O5'*'4314", 'Carlos Manchego', 'Goldstein Realty', 'show contact info', 'Direct ocean view, large 2 bedrooms/ 2.5 bath.', 'Fully furnished & equipped, tastefully decorated, upgraded kitchen, fresh painted, huge rap-around terrace from 32nd floor!', 'with always preferable east view (ocean, city, intracoastal).', 'Luxury amenities, including pool, gym, jacuzzi, beach service and valet parking.', '24 h concierge.', 'Convenient location close to shopping entertainment and public transportation.', 'Priced for 6 or more months rent.', 'Available for long term only.', 'Priced for one year lease.', 'Price for 6 months will be discussed.', 'Read Less', 'REF# 11R114', 'tags:', 'venetia condo, asia, bay park towers, courtyards of the grove, the edge on brickell, filling station, met 3, brickell ten condo, venetia condo, the loft downtown i, brickell key, brickell bay club, le parc at brickell, neo vertika condo, asia, viceroy, the atlantis on brickell, mayfield condo, bay park towers, brickell bay club, grove towers, the latitude, the vue at brickell, brickell key one, imperial at brickell, axis on brickell south, one bayfront plaza, marquis residences, water view, morningside homes, 1060 brickell, solaris at brickell,, 23 biscayne bay condo, 1010 brickell', '_mr11']
